name: @aws-lambda/mds-provider
description: AWS Lambda for MDS Provider API

scripts.lambda:dev3-mds-provider: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-east-2 --function-name dev3-mds-provider --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-provider.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-prod-mds-provider: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-prod-mds-provider --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-provider.zip
scripts.lambda:ladot-sandbox-mds-provider: yarn bundle && aws lambda update-function-code --region us-west-2 --function-name ladot-sandbox-mds-provider --zip-file fileb://dist/bundles/mds-provider.zip
scripts.test: yarn test:prettier && yarn test:eslint && yarn test:unit

author: City of Los Angeles
